Definition: MOHCD defined project name

Planning Department project address

Supervisorial District of project

Definition: Type of development project
Type of arrangement households can occupy the housing
Date project is authorized to begin construction
Notes (optional): Projected date Notice to Proceed will be issued to general contractor

Definition: Estimated date that construction or rehabilitation is complete
Notes (optional): Projected date of Temporary Certificate of Occupancy (TCO) or DBI sign-off of completed permit job card

Definition: MOHCD/OCII staff assigned to manage project on City's behalf
MOHCD construction management staff assigned to oversee construction or rehabilitation on City's behalf
Lead project developer
Project co-developer
Legal owner of project and borrower of MOHCD/OCII funding
Developer's project manager
Building permit number issued by Department of Building Inspection for projects under construction or rehabilitation
Total number of units in project
Notes (optional): Includes affordable and market rate units

Total number of market rate units
Percentage of affordable units in project

Number of affordable 2-bedroom units

Number of affordable 4-bedroom units
Number of affordable 5 bedroom or larger units

Definition: Units whose occupancy is restricted by age
Units serving transition-age youth
